titles.title: Increasing the statutory limit on the public debt.
Increasing the statutory limit on the public debt.

vote.text: Pursuant to the provisions of S. Con. Res. 70, H.J. Res. 92 is considered passed House.

action.text: Received in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 770.

bill.summary: Increases the statutory limit on the public debt from $9.815 trillion to $10.615 trillion.
